results.title: Development of feelings in children
results.creator_credit: Donald Connors and Parents' Magazine Films
results.brief_description: Describes and illustrates how the child develops feelings, stressing that the child must be allowed to express his/her feelings freely, particularly feelings of fear, anger and hate. Aims to make parents aware of the distinction between feelings and actions, and suggests ways that parents can aid the healthy emotional development of their child.
results.description: Describes and illustrates how the child develops feelings, stressing that the child must be allowed to express his/her feelings freely, particularly feelings of fear, anger and hate. results.title: Development (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Bruce Hart, CRM Productions and McGraw-Hill Films
results.brief_description: This film examines the stages of growth from birth to adolescence, introducing the concept of human psychological development. Accompanied by a song written and performed by Donovan and another written by Graham Nash and performed by Crosby, stills, Nash and Young.

results.title: Development & diversity
results.creator_credit: Darrel Schwandt, George A. Colburn, GPN and DLGHS
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “The Worlds of childhood”.
Exploration of the historical, cultural, and individual diversity of childhood: what development is, how it occurs and the significance of the the prolonged period of human infancy and childhood. A visual tour of development includes children in Russia, Japan, Brazil, Cameroon and New York.

results.title: Developing objectives
results.creator_credit: Stephen Bosustow, Kaiser Aluminium and Chemical Corporation and Stephen Bosustow Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Management by objectives and performance appraisal”.
An industrial training film which uses animation to show employees methods of writing and developing work objectives which are understandable, measurable, challenging, achievable, and with a target dagte for completion.

results.title: Developing more and better ideas
results.brief_description: A down-to-earth presentation of the process of developing ideas to help everyone, from top management to lowest rate employee, produce more and better ideas for cutting costs, increasing productivity, developing products and improving quality and performance.

results.title: Developing managerial talent
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Personnel Management”.
This film deals with the personnel side of management and enterprises where this function falls upon a particular manager. Discusses the recruiting and training of managers.

results.title: Developing leadership
results.brief_description: Discusses those traits of character which contribute to a boy’s capacity as a leader. The film is centred around a story in which a boy responds to an emergency and proves himself to be a leader by his enthusiasm, by his vision and imagination, and by his readiness to accept responsibility.
